docs.snippet: We are happy to announce that Brig-Gen. Innis N. Palmer, reported killed in Saturday's battle before Richmond, is probably safe.

docs.snippet: A year ago, Baltimore had the reputation of being the most turbulent and disorderly city in the Union the City of Mobs and Monuments. Election riots were the common law of the municipality.
